sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"
import Flippy, { FrontSide, BackSide } from 'react-flippy';

<Flippy
        flipOnHover={true} // default false
        flipDirection="horizontal" // horizontal or vertical
         // to use toggle method like this.flippy.toggle()
        // if you pass isFlipped prop component will be controlled component.
        // and other props, which will go to div
        ref={(r) => this.flippy = r}/// these are optional style, it is not necessary
        
      >
        
        <FrontSide style={{
        
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        flexDirection: 'column',
       
        width:'min-content',
        boxShadow: "none"
        
      }}>
            
        <Card imgsrc={img1} style={{ maxWidth: '100%', maxHeight: '100%' }} title="ABDOCASILLAS"/>                    
        </FrontSide>
       
        <BackSide style={{
        
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        flexDirection: 'column',
       
        width:'min-content',
        boxShadow: "none"
        
      }}>
       <Card imgsrc={img1} title="ABDOCASILLAS"/>                    
        </BackSide>
        
      </Flippy>
